narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Legends Residential Care LLC is a In Home Supportive Care provider based in Windham, ME. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $32.9M in Medicaid payments across 4K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $32.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
